page.title: 14The Convent School,Belper
page.content: { St.Elizabeth's Convent School}is for Roman Catholic children from 5 years to 11years. The house was bought in 1947 and was made into a convent in 1952 when 2 classrooms were built. The school started in 1936 in the St. John's Ambulance Room. The 2nd stage was in 1959 when they built 3 more classrooms,a kitchen and a hall. In 1962 two more classrooms and toilets were added and the school now has 200 pupils,coming from a 20 mile radius. They have two playgrounds,one for small children and one for older ones. -------------------------------------- {The Raft Race There is a raft race held yearly where people build rafts and race from Belper Mill to Milford Mill. There is a soap box competition where everybody builds a car and disguises it as something.
